verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> came אַנְשֵׁ֣י ׀ <S%H376><s%> and the men קִרְיַ֣ת יְעָרִ֗ים <S%H7157><s%> of Kirjathjearim וַֽיַּעֲלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> and fetched up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיָּבִ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> and brought אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> it into the house אֲבִינָדָ֖ב <S%H41><s%> of Abinadab בַּגִּבְעָ֑ה <S%H1389><s%> in the hill וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶלְעָזָ֤ר <S%H499><s%> Eleazar בְּנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> his son קִדְּשׁ֔וּ <S%H6942><s%> and sanctified לִשְׁמֹ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> to keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD פ

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become מִיּ֞וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it came to pass while שֶׁ֤בֶת <S%H3427><s%> abode הָֽאָרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּקִרְיַ֣ת יְעָרִ֔ים <S%H7157><s%> in Kirjathjearim וַיִּרְבּוּ֙ <S%H7235><s%> was long הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> that the time וַיִּֽהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> it was עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> for it was twenty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיִּנָּה֛וּ <S%H5091><s%> lamented כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto all the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבַבְכֶ֗ם <S%H3824><s%> with all your hearts אַתֶּ֤ם <S%H859><s%> you שָׁבִים֙ <S%H7725><s%> If ye do return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD הָסִ֜ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> [then] put away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֧י <S%H430><s%> gods הַנֵּכָ֛ר <S%H5236><s%> the strange מִתּוֹכְכֶ֖ם <S%H8432><s%> from among וְהָעַשְׁתָּר֑וֹת <S%H6252><s%> and Ashtaroth וְהָכִ֨ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> you and prepare לְבַבְכֶ֤ם <S%H3824><s%> your hearts אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְעִבְדֻ֣הוּ <S%H5647><s%> and serve לְבַדּ֔וֹ <S%H905><s%> alone וְיַצֵּ֥ל <S%H5337><s%> him only and he will deliver אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> you out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines

וַיָּסִ֙ירוּ֙ <S%H5493><s%> did put away בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Then the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּעָלִ֖ים <S%H1168><s%> Baalim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעַשְׁתָּרֹ֑ת <S%H6252><s%> and Ashtaroth וַיַּעַבְד֥וּ <S%H5647><s%> and served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H905><s%> alone פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel קִבְצ֥וּ <S%H6908><s%> Gather אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> all Israel הַמִּצְפָּ֑תָה <S%H4709><s%> Mitspah וְאֶתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <S%H6419><s%> and I will pray בַּעַדְכֶ֖ם <S%H1157><s%> about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> for you unto the LORD

וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> And they gathered together הַ֠מִּצְפָּתָה <S%H4709><s%> to Mizpeh וַיִּֽשְׁאֲבוּ־ <S%H7579><s%> and drew מַ֜יִם <S%H4325><s%> water וַֽיִּשְׁפְּכ֣וּ ׀ <S%H8210><s%> and poured [it] out לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיָּצ֙וּמוּ֙ <S%H6684><s%> and fasted בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> on that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> and said שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there חָטָ֖אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> there We have sinned לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֧ט <S%H8199><s%> judged שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בַּמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <S%H4709><s%> Mizpah

וַיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> And when the Philistines כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִתְקַבְּצ֤וּ <S%H6908><s%> were gathered together בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> that the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַמִּצְפָּ֔תָה <S%H4709><s%> to Mizpah וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> went up סַרְנֵֽי־ <S%H5633><s%> the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַֽיִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> heard בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּֽרְא֖וּ <S%H3372><s%> [it] they were afraid מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> of פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines

וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> said בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> to Samuel אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּחֲרֵ֣שׁ <S%H2790><s%> Cease מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at מִזְּעֹ֖ק <S%H2199><s%> not to cry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God וְיֹשִׁעֵ֖נוּ <S%H3467><s%> for us that he will save מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> us out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel טְלֵ֤ה <S%H2924><s%> lamb חָלָב֙ <S%H2461><s%> sucking אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> a [וַיַּעֲלֶה כ] (וַיַּעֲלֵ֧הוּ <S%H5927><s%> arise ק) עוֹלָ֛ה <S%H5930><s%> [it for] a burnt offering כָּלִ֖יל <S%H3632><s%> wholly לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיִּזְעַ֨ק <S%H2199><s%> cried שְׁמוּאֵ֤ל <S%H8050><s%> and Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בְּעַ֣ד <S%H1157><s%> for יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> for Israel וַֽיַּעֲנֵ֖הוּ <S%H6030><s%> heard יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> And as Samuel מַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> was offering up הָעוֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offering וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֣ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines נִגְּשׁ֔וּ <S%H5066><s%> drew near לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַיַּרְעֵ֣ם <S%H7481><s%> thundered יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD בְּקוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> thunder גָּ֠דוֹל <S%H1419><s%> with a great בַּיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> on that day הַה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against פְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> upon the Philistines וַיְהֻמֵּ֔ם <S%H2000><s%> and discomfited וַיִּנָּגְפ֖וּ <S%H5062><s%> them and they were smitten לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַיֵּ֨צְא֜וּ <S%H3318><s%> went out אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H582><s%> And the men יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַמִּצְפָּ֔ה <S%H4709><s%> of Mizpeh וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֖וּ <S%H7291><s%> and pursued אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines וַיַּכּ֕וּם <S%H5221><s%> and smote עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far מִתַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash לְבֵ֥ית כָּֽר׃ <S%H1033><s%> them until [they came] under Bethcar

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took שְׁמוּאֵ֜ל <S%H8050><s%> Then Samuel אֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone אַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> a וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and set בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between הַמִּצְפָּה֙ <S%H4709><s%> [it] between Mizpeh וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between הַשֵּׁ֔ן <S%H8129><s%> and Shen וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמָ֖הּ <S%H8034><s%> the name אֶ֣בֶן הָעָ֑זֶר <S%H72><s%> of it Ebenezer וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> saying עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הֵ֖נָּה <S%H2008><s%> Thus עֲזָרָ֥נוּ <S%H5826><s%> helped יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Hitherto hath the LORD

וַיִּכָּֽנְעוּ֙ <S%H3665><s%> were subdued הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> So the Philistines וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and they יָסְפ֣וּ <S%H3254><s%> no more ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> anymore לָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> and they came בִּגְב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> into the coast יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַתְּהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> and the hand יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> was against the Philistines כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> all the days שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H8050><s%> of Samuel

וַתָּשֹׁ֣בְנָה <S%H7725><s%> were restored הֶעָרִ֡ים <S%H5892><s%> And the cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לָֽקְחוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> had taken פְלִשְׁתִּים֩ <S%H6430><s%> which the Philistines מֵאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל ׀ <S%H3478><s%> from Israel לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> to Israel מֵעֶקְר֣וֹן <S%H6138><s%> from Ekron וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even גַּ֔ת <S%H1661><s%> even unto Gath וְאֶ֨ת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּבוּלָ֔ן <S%H1366><s%> and the coasts הִצִּ֥יל <S%H5337><s%> deliver יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> thereof did Israel מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> out of the hands פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> there was שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> And there was peace בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> between Israel וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <S%H567><s%> and the Amorites

וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֤ט <S%H8199><s%> judged שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> all the days חַיָּֽיו׃ <S%H2416><s%> of his life

וְהָלַ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> And he went מִדֵּ֤י <S%H1767><s%> from שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> year בְּשָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> to year וְסָבַב֙ <S%H5437><s%> in circuit בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> to Bethel וְהַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <S%H1537><s%> and Gilgal וְהַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <S%H4709><s%> and Mizpeh וְשָׁפַט֙ <S%H8199><s%> and judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמְּקוֹמ֖וֹת <S%H4725><s%> in all those places הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

וּתְשֻׁבָת֤וֹ <S%H8666><s%> And his return הָרָמָ֙תָה֙ <S%H7414><s%> [was] to Ramah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> for there [was] his house וְשָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> and there שָׁפָ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> and there he judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַיִּֽבֶן־ <S%H1129><s%> and there he built שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD פ
